institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Global Job Support Business Rules/Article 19 (Employment Recognition Standards)
contents: Article 19 (Standards for recognition of employment) ① Those employed through financial support projects such as cost support arrangements must enter into a paid work contract, provide work for at least one month at the same overseas company, and obtain a visa that allows them to legally stay and work in the country. It is recognized only in certain cases., ② Employment through general placement is only in cases where the job seeker applies for the recruitment notice registered by the recruiting company on World Job Plus and the recruitment is successful, and departure is confirmed after signing the employment contract (paid). It is acknowledged. ③ If requested by the Chairman, the operating organization and the employed person must personally check and issue employment proof documents, certificate of entry and exit from the relevant country, etc. and submit them to the Corporation. ④ Other employment recognition standards and details may be determined separately by the Chairman, taking into account the characteristics of each business.
